txt.en: Billina the hen seems to be upset, you should try and find out what is wrong with her.

'Billina is eating again but she still looks upset.  You did as good a job as could be asked getting her to eat again, do you think you could calm her too?\n\n'Pa doesn't like me fussing with Billina, says I get her too excitable.  He has taken a liking to you though.  Maybe he would even hire you on as a  farmhand if you had a mind for it, I could use the extra help.'
Billina is in the yard at Sandson's Farm.\n\nYou should try to find out what is wrong with Billina. She is quite an intelligent chicken.
Billina looks slightly less agitated than before, but she looks as if she is waiting for something.
Billina is in the yard at Sandson's Farm.\n\nYou should check on Billina.
Wald Sandson is in the yard at Sandson's Farm.\n\nYou should return to Wald Sandson and tell him of your success.

Billina ruffles her feathers and begins to make sharp clucking sounds. It seems that she is worried about something.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>WARNING: This quest begins a special session quest. You will be logged out of your normal character and take on the guise of a player friendly npc. You will not be able to leave the Shire as this character and will attain a set of skills unique to this special player character.</rgb>
'Billina looks much calmer [placeholder], thank you!\n\n'By the way, did you happen to see an odd rooster on the farm?  I thought I saw one, but I never got a good look at it.'
'I just don't understand what is making Billina upset!'
